name: RICE UNIVERSITY
sampleDescriptions: Work with Rice faculty who develop tax policy papers of interest to members of Congress. Advocate with AAU, NAICU and aligned institutions on tax policies important to the higher education community.
We advocate for research and policy papers developed by faculty that could be of interest to policy makers and government agencies.
We often have students and faculty who have casework issues with government agencies. We work with our Congressional delegation to support these efforts.

We work with Members of Congress and the Dept. of Energy to highlight energy research that is conducted across our campus. We also work with faculty and fellows to share energy policy research and pap

We advocate for research and policy papers developed by faculty that could be of interest to policy makers and government agencies regarding creation of economic conditions favorable to small business
